entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
